siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Internalizing virtues
frontmatter.description: The right instinctual thought processes can turn problems into opportunities, find silver linings, and generally change perceptions of the same experiences

frontmatter.title: Stick to healthy habits at inflection points
frontmatter.description: Inflection points can be positive or negative. Stick to the good habits at times of change. Don't allow the changes to make it a negative inflection point. Develop a new positive trajectory.

frontmatter.title: Develop a list of virtues to guide life
frontmatter.description: Generally, virtues are ideals agreed upon by most of society as being positive. These differ from values, which vary greatly for each individually. Based upon Ben Franklin's list, this is an modernized simple list of virtues.

frontmatter.title: Time to act upon virtues
frontmatter.description: How we act now will determine the future. It's not time to return to the past. Act now upon virtues. Do more that will be looked back upon well in the years to come.

frontmatter.title: Actively support virtues and values
frontmatter.description: We all deserve to be treated fairly. We all deserve justice. We all deserve better. Live with kindness. Live with integrity. Live with trust.

frontmatter.title: Trust in the future to find joy in the present
frontmatter.description: Trust in the future to find joy in the present. The future is steadily, continually approaching regardless of our actions.
